messages.subject: Poignant quotes from John Lennon
messages.msgSnippet: All we are saying is give peace a chance War is over if you want it You say you ll change the constitution, well you know We all want to change your head
messages.messageBody:
"All we are saying is give peace a chance"


"War is over if you want it"


"You say you'll change the constitution, well you know
We all want to change your head
You tell me it's the institution, well you know
You better free your mind instead"


"People say we got it made
Don't they know we're so afraid
Isolation
We're afraid to be alone
Everybody got to have a home
Isolation
Just a boy and a little girl
Trying to change the whole wide world
Isolation
The world is just a little town
Everybody trying to put us down
Isolation
I don't expect you to understand
After you caused so much pain
But then again you're not to blame
You're just a human, a victim of the insane
We're afraid of everyone
Afraid of the sun
Isolation
The sun will never disappear
But the world may not have many years
Isolation"


"Love is real, real is love
Love is feeling, feeling love
Love is wanting to be loved

Love is touch, touch is love
Love is reaching, reaching love
Love is asking to be loved

Love is you
You and me
Love is knowing
We can be

Love is free, free is love
Love is living, living love
Love is needing to be loved"



John
http://members.xoom.com/joandersen

Usually it's easier to be a success than to be a human.
